data.name: Flippin Kaktus Demo
data.detailed_description:
Flippin Kaktus is a brutal action-driven vendetta featuring a spiky hero with the thorny past and rage-outbreaks combat style. When the vicious "Calaveras" drug cartel raids his home, he breaks bad in a hardcore journey to save his foster family. Reveal the dark side of the wacky 80s punk and flip the switch to obliterate anyone in his path!

Break BAD...

When you fight alone against the vicious cartel, the end justifies the extreme. Switch Kaktus into the RAGE mode to make raiders get what they deserve. Fuel up with tequila and adrenaline-pumping substances to annihilate your enemies into oblivion.

...or keep a COOL head

If you don't want to find yourself in an open fight with the hostiles without a plan, you can always try to sabotage their actions! Strategize and challenge your reflexes: dodge bullets, equip various armor, set ambushes and traps and make use of the interactive environment to get rid of the thugs. Forklift lowrider? It’s on!

In ADDICTIVE gameplay

Never get bored with endless tactical possibilities (and explosions)! Excel in action by mixing stealth and dexterity with rage-fueled killing sprees to dominate your opponents.

Sending NOSTALGIC vibes...

Immerse yourself into 11 unique locations and beautifully hand-crafted levels inspired by Latin-American aesthetics, classic retro games, and critically acclaimed VHS action flicks.

...and rockin' HARD!

Enjoy a uniquely composed fusion of authentic mariachi, rock and synthwave, explore artist-tailored graphic novel and connect all the dots in this thrilling desperado odyssey.

data.short_description: Flippin Kaktus is an action-driven vendetta with 80s vibes, featuring a spiky hero with the thorny past and rage-outbreaks combat style.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound system / headphones recommended
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad with vibration support is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad is recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11.6
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz / Apple M1 +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound system / headphones recommended
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad with vibration support is recommended

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains alcohol and drug use.

Alcohol, drugs and some other substances equip protagonist with rage and temporary powers for combat, but reduce health and sanity in exchange.
